metadata.name: InvoicePartiesExtraction
metadata.description: Prompt template for extracting vendor and customer information from invoice images
metadata.author: BouwdepotInvoiceValidator

template.role: You are an expert in extracting structured data from invoice images.
template.task: Your task is to analyze the provided invoice images and extract vendor and customer information.
template.outputFormat:
Respond with a JSON object in the following format: {
  "vendorName": "Vendor name",
  "vendorAddress": "Vendor address",
  "vendorContact": "Vendor contact info",
  "customerName": "Customer name",
  "customerAddress": "Customer address"
}
